commands.name: az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg create
commands.summary: Create monitored Azure DevOps organization details.
commands.syntax:
az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg create --name
                                                            --org-name
                                                            --resource-group
                                                            [--actionable-remediation]
                                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg list
commands.summary: List Azure DevOps organizations onboarded to the connector.
commands.syntax:
az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg list --name
                                                          --resource-group
                                                          [--max-items]
                                                          [--next-token]

commands.name: az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg show
commands.summary: Get a monitored Azure DevOps organization resource.
commands.syntax:
az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg show [--ids]
                                                          [--name]
                                                          [--org-name]
                                                          [--resource-group]
                                                          [--subscription]

commands.name: az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg update
commands.summary: Update monitored Azure DevOps organization details.
commands.syntax:
az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg update [--actionable-remediation]
                                                            [--ids]
                                                            [--name]
                                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                            [--org-name]
                                                            [--resource-group]
                                                            [--subscription]
examples: az security security-connectors devops azuredevopsorgs projects repos update --security-connector-name myConnectorName --resource-group myResourceGroup --org-name myOrganization --actionable-remediation state=Disabled

az security security-connectors devops azuredevopsorgs projects repos update --security-connector-name myConnectorName --resource-group myResourceGroup --org-name myOrganization --actionable-remediation state=Enabled category-configurations[0].category=IaC category-configurations[0].minimum-severity-level=Low

commands.name: az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az security security-connector devops azuredevopsorg wait [--created]
                                                          [--custom]
                                                          [--deleted]
                                                          [--exists]
                                                          [--ids]
                                                          [--interval]
                                                          [--name]
                                                          [--org-name]
                                                          [--resource-group]
                                                          [--subscription]
                                                          [--timeout]
                                                          [--updated]
